content.html: We need to normalize sharing *good* stories about interviewing. Between AWS, Riot, Spotify and Citadel, I was never asked a single comp sci leetcode question. No quicksort, no red/black trees, etc. Plenty of coding, but absolutely nothing you’d need to prepare for. twitter.com/hussien_coding…
content.value: We need to normalize sharing *good* stories about interviewing. Between AWS, Riot, Spotify and Citadel, I was never asked a single comp sci leetcode question. No quicksort, no red/black trees, etc. Plenty of coding, but absolutely nothing you’d need to prepare for.

content.html:
Spotify, Riot, & AWS all gave me coding exercises I never come close to in my actual job. None of them handled my accommodations request very well (no live audience), either. I can count on one hand the “good” interview processes I’ve had. Most interview processes are daunting.
twitter.com/adamrackis/sta…
content.value:
Spotify, Riot, & AWS all gave me coding exercises I never come close to in my actual job.

None of them handled my accommodations request very well (no live audience), either.

I can count on one hand the “good” interview processes I’ve had. Most interview processes are daunting.
